title: Transfer by gift or exercise of power of appointment
context: [ยง553A-4] Transfer by gift or exercise of power of appointment. A person may make a transfer by irrevocable gift to, or the irrevocable exercise of a power of appointment in favor of, a custodian for the benefit of a minor pursuant to section 553A-9. [L 1985, c 91, pt of ยง1]
